briefTitle: Carfilzomib in Combination With Dexamethasone (Kd) in Chinese Patients With Relapsed & Refractory Multiple Myeloma
officialTitle: An Open-label, Single-arm, Phase 3 Study of Carfilzomib in Combination With Dexamethasone in Subjects With Relapsed and Refractory Multiple Myeloma in China
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability and overall response rate of carfilzomib in combination with dexamethasone for the treatment of multiple myeloma in China.

primaryOutcome.measure: Overall Response Rate (ORR) After at Least 6 Cycles of Treatment Assessed by the Independent Review Committee
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Response was assessed every 28 days until disease progression; ORR was analyzed after all participants received at least 6 cycles or discontinued treatment; the data cut-off date was 5 November 2018; median follow-up time for progression was 8.9 months.
